dashboard.welcome:
ğŸŒŸ Welcome to coaching!

You don't have any athletes yet.
Add your first athlete to get started and begin receiving notifications when they log measurements!

ğŸ’¡ **Tip:** Athletes can find you by your username to request supervision.

guide.title: ğŸ“ **Coach Guide**
guide.content:
**Getting Started:**
1ï¸âƒ£ Add athletes using the â• Add Athlete button
2ï¸âƒ£ Athletes must have used this bot before
3ï¸âƒ£ You'll receive notifications when they log measurements

**Finding Athletes:**
â€¢ Use their username (like john_doe)
â€¢ Use their Telegram ID number
â€¢ Ask them to find you by your username

**Managing Athletes:**
ğŸ“Š View individual progress and history
ğŸ—‘ï¸ Remove athletes when needed
ğŸ”” Customize notification preferences

**Notifications:**
You'll get instant alerts when athletes:
â€¢ Add new measurements
â€¢ Reach goals (if enabled)
â€¢ Haven't been active (if enabled)

**Tips:**
ğŸ’¡ Athletes can have multiple coaches
ğŸ’¡ All your athlete data stays private
ğŸ’¡ You keep your own athlete features too

Ready to start coaching? Add your first athlete! ğŸš€
